Caption: 

### 📝 What you need to know

How’s this as a rallying cry for the XRP Army: [For a while](https://decrypt.co/331388/xrp-now-larger-than-pepsico-uber-blackrock-and-is-closing-in-on-mcdonalds) this morning, XRP’s $203 billion market capitalization made it larger than PepsiCo, Uber, BlackRock and put it within striking distance of McDonald’s, according to [Infinite Market Cap](https://8marketcap.com/?search=xrp).

It didn’t last, however. The XRP market cap has since slipped to $191 billion. That’s still bigger than BlackRock and Uber—but Pepsi, [the choice of a new generation](https://youtu.be/KpA-D_riXgs?si=nWswvRMkFs1nE3At&t=1052), has pulled ahead.

Analysts have started to warn that even if alts like XRP, Ethereum, and Solana look primed for a [strong end of the year](https://decrypt.co/331397/why-ethereum-keep-climbing-coming-months-bitwise), the current [frothy market](https://decrypt.co/331435/are-things-getting-too-frothy-ethereum-xrp-altcoins) could produce some near term volatility. 

The advice from one analyst at BRN: Stay in cash or stables to minimize losses and get back into alts at a favorable entry point.
